newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman starts Rational Software.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman starts Rational Software.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs said it initiated coverage of Rational Software Corp as market outperform.

-- Goldman analyst Rick Sherlund said he believes last October's agreement between Rational and Microsoft, as well as Rational's proposed acquisition of SQA Inc, will expand Rational's market leadership.
-- Sherlund predicts revenue growth of about 40 percent for the fiscal year ending March 1997, and about 35 percent in fiscal 1998.
-- Earnings per share growth for the current fiscal year is seen at about 100 percent, and 65 percent next year, Sherlund said in a report.
